common.heroDesc: one of the market leaders specializing in electrical engineering and electronics. Our stable partnerships, from a large range of global manufacturers, allows us to offer our customers reliable and adaptable power modules, chips/microchips, UC's DC-DC converters.

aboutSection.title: About company
aboutSection.desc1: Individual “Pursatly Ýöriş” was founded in 2020. The company has the necessary knowledge and experience to offer you the best solutions in the field of engineering, electronics and electrical engineering.
aboutSection.desc2: Our ability to assess the current and future needs of your business and project, provide multiple best options, speed up and optimize your business.
aboutSection.desc3: We cooperate with public and private companies, ministries and organizations, and also have trusting partnerships with foreign manufacturers.

partners.desc: Our company is the official representative and distributor of world leaders in the field of IT electronics and electrical engineering.

footer.desc: We carry out deliveries, as well as installation and commissioning of the most reliable and technologically advanced electrical equipment. Contact our sales department for a price quote, and you can always get technical advice.

animeDesc.img0: NXP Semiconductors provides solutions based on High Performance Mixed Signal and standard semiconductor components.
animeDesc.img1: Texas International designs, manufactures analog and embedded semiconductors that help to create differentiated applications in markets that include industrial, automotive, personal electronics, communications equipment and enterprise systems.
animeDesc.img2: Hybrid Power Drive (HPD) module by Microchip is a cost-effective unit integrating a power bridge and a driver stage. Its output power rating starts at 5 kVA.
animeDesc.img3: Samsung provides a wide range of hardware products as well as IT solutions and creates unique products with a high level of technology.
animeDesc.img4: Intel creates electronic devices and computer components: microprocessors and system logic sets for client computing systems and data centers, chips for artificial intelligence systems.
